techmeme.title: Nvidia and Mistral announce Mistral NeMo, a 12B-parameter model with a context window of up to 128k tokens, available under the Apache 2.0 open-source license (Michael Nuñez/VentureBeat)
Adobe: US shoppers spent $14.2B during Amazon's 48-hour Prime Day sale, up 11% YoY and in line with estimates; Numerator: the average household spent about $152 (Spencer Soper/Bloomberg)
Sources: Apple has spoken to major Hollywood studios about acquiring more programming from their libraries to offer customers both in the US and abroad (Bloomberg)
OpenAI unveils GPT-4o mini, calling it "the most capable and cost-efficient small model available", and plans to integrate image, video, and audio into it later (Hayden Field/CNBC)
New York-based Coast, which offers expense management tools for vehicle fleets, raised a $40M Series B, after raising $25M in March 2024 and $27.5M in 2022 (Mary Ann Azevedo/TechCrunch)
